pages.page: Classic Buckles Buckles Classic

Classic Buckles
Montana Silversmiths classic buckle designs are the result of over 45 years of buckle building excellence and our world class master engraving. The classic buckles section is filled with authentic detailed designs in a variety of rich jeweler’s finishes. Select designs from our classic buckles include our hand-sculpted figures; miniature works of art that add an extra touch to the piece.

The Mountain
Glacier Turquoise
The Mountain Glacier Turquoise stone is inspired by the colorful rocks of Lake MacDonald, in Montana's Glacier National Park. Each unique stone is comprised of vibrantly colored oyster shell, natural hand-cut turquoise, extracted from the Kingman mine of Arizona and infused with rich copper.

GERMAN SILVER
German Silver is a trade name for full 18% Nickel polished to a jewelry finish. There is no silver in German Silver. Rope edges are hand applied jeweler’s bronze. These individually crafted buckle's patina may vary. Buckles are shown at actual size.
